about_the_game:
Dive into the world of RetroFight, an exhilarating multiplayer strategy game where every move counts, and retroactivity is the key to victory!


Challenge up to 1 player in epic turn-based battles where every decision impacts your next move retroactively.

Anticipate your opponents' actions, choose your next move carefully, adapt to unexpected twists, and become the master of temporal strategy!
With its multiple settings and innovative gameplay, RetroFight promises hours of intense entertainment.

Explore diverse arenas, challenge your friends online, and prove your supremacy in breathtaking strategic battles.

Are you ready to take on the challenge and write your legend in RetroFight history?
